title: Snowflakes On My Lashes
description: The Peacock Writers are a fluid group of authors from around the world who are dedicated in raising funds to help support various children's charities. The Peacocks release a new edition bi-annual in either the Fall/Winter or Spring/Summer category with a sub theme.This Edition is for the Fall/Winter Season and the theme is Winter Fun.We hope you enjoy, "Snowflakes On My Lashes."
author: The Peacock Writers
